title: How to write a news report - Quora

response.answer_text: While writing a news article or news report, where the sole aim of the writer is to grab the reader’s attention, one must follow these principles. In Journalism, this type of approach towards writing is called the Inverted Pyramid approach. Concentrate on the most important facts of the news first. This helps the reader gauge If they want to continue reading the article further.Proceed onto the necessary information which is required for the reader to immediately read in order to further understand the news better.Continue to state the least important information that is not required to complete the news report, but would complete the article and would not leave the reader short of insight on the incident.By following these steps, you can develop on your Journalism writing.
